## 4 Feb 2024
{: #network-latency-2024-02-04}

### Inter-region latency
{: #network-latency-2024-02-04-mzr}

| Average latency (ms) | Dallas | Toronto | Washington DC | Frankfurt | London | Madrid | Osaka | Sydney | Tokyo | Sao Paulo |
| --- | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: |
| **Dallas** |   | 34 | 31 | 122 | 113 | 118 | 151 | 184 | 143 | 145 |
| **Toronto** |  34 |  | 19 | 92 | 82 | 107 | 171 | 215 | 163 | 127 |
| **Washington DC** |  31 | 19 |  | 98 | 75 | 89 | 175 | 215 | 168 | 119 |
| **Frankfurt** |  122 | 92 | 98 |  | 12 | 29 | 242 | 249 | 234 | 193 |
| **London** |  112 | 82 | 75 | 12 |  | 26 | 253 | 261 | 247 | 185 |
| **Madrid** |  119 | 105 | 89 | 29 | 26 |  | 266 | 274 | 260 | 207 |
| **Osaka** |  150 | 171 | 175 | 242 | 253 | 266 |  | 124 | 9 | 293 |
| **Sydney** |  186 | 214 | 215 | 249 | 261 | 274 | 123 |  | 118 | 328 |
| **Tokyo** |  142 | 164 | 168 | 236 | 247 | 260 | 9 | 117 |  | 284 |
| **Sao Paulo** |  145 | 129 | 116 | 193 | 185 | 209 | 293 | 328 | 284 |  |
{: caption="Table 45. 6 Jan 2024–4 Feb 2024" caption-side="bottom"}
